refnamediv.refpurpose: Name of a custom CSS file to use for documents formatted as HTML

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This used to be set by default to ‘default.css’. Starting in 2.4.0, the default stylesheet is always included first. If you specify $docbook.css, it will be added last, so that it will have the highest priority in the cascade.
